author: darkbluedarz
clean_body: i am furious i emailed riot a week ago explaining that we have a china expat community that ran into issues buying tickets for msi and previous lol events no reply tickets for the semifinals finals went on presale this morning for only those who have a mastercard http and theyre gone http our group has tried all morning for an hour straight to get a ticket and they got botted and are already on reselling sites at x price riot will say its linked to your passport which does not matter in china they dont care at the door of the event if youre thinking about flying to shanghai for the event dont bother as an international visitor you wont get a ticket shameful from riot

author: Angry_Hotel_Customer
clean_body: link with proof http not too long after i posted my original mastercard twisted fate skin idea where i talked about the new partnership between them and riot and proposed an amusing way of bringing the fans on board i got a message from uriotstags followed by an email from a mastercard representative saying they wanted to gift me k rp and a tf skin well today i received them i guess this means ive peaked but also mastercard are the sponsor of sponsors because i havent heard of something like this happening before with league and sponsorships to regular fans i did not expect anything like this to happen when i originally posted obviously but this is such a welcome surprise and im really grateful and appreciative of both riot and mastercard for making this happen its the personal touches like these that make a good company in my opinion connecting with their customers like this and giving back thank mr mastercard edit link to original post http

author: deathspate
clean_body: basically the title although a lot of people may say that the jingle is very loud or jarring i think for what it is and what it means to do it accomplishes the goal pretty well first item completions are pretty powerful and i usually always forget to track these things myself as i get too absorbed into the game the mastercard jingle is pretty distinct enough to break my attention and bring my attention to whichever lane usually jungle had just gotten their item complete

author: Angry_Hotel_Customer
clean_body: since league has decided to bring in more sponsors in the broadcast etc i figured the best way players would accept this is with a skin here are my ideas on how such a skin would work with an ability rundown passive loaded bank account upon killing a unit a mastercard logo pops up and rewards him with anywhere between and bonus gold to his mastercard account also instead of gold to spend at the shop he uses credit obviously q wild cards mastercard twisted fate throws three cards bronze silver and gold to represent the tiers of fans we have for our teams dealing damage to each enemy unit they pass through w pick a card mastercard twisted fate chooses a mastercard from his deck and uses for his next attack causing bonus effects credit mastercard slows enemies just like it slows the speed of your bank account decreasing debit mastercard gives the most damage and refunds mana because reasons savings mastercard stuns the enemy hit as they cannot believe the incredible savings rates brought to you by mastercard e stacked account every four attacks bills will float around mastercard twisted fate and his next attack will throw a big mastercard at the enemy dealing bonus damage r destiny mastercard twisted fate predicts the financial misfortune of his foes grants true sight and allows him to teleport across the map to give them the incredible good credit only brought to you by mastercard also this skin will only allow you to run the acer predator rune keystone

author: I_AM_LoLNewbie
clean_body: like the title says i would be interested in a card that offered rp back for purchases i imagine it would also make sense for both riot and mastercard directly linking the two companies with a product for lol players it also wouldnt be unprecedented for riot to issue a cobranded card with rewards for their players previously riot has partnered with amex to offer the rp american servehttp however the long term rp rewards were lacking as it was a debit card with the higher interchange fees that credit cards charge riot could potentially offer a more lucrative rewards program if they were to release a cobranded credit card a potential rewards program could be something along the lines of rp per dollar spent with a rp signup bonus and custom lol card design id like to hear what the community thinks of the idea and if there is support for a lol credit card

author: Nandonut
clean_body: just thought id set something up and see how people are getting on in the hunt for buying tickets for worlds finals i was in the waiting room on multiple devices and browsers i saw people saying online different browsers works when it comes to their not more than one tab open thing and currently my bar hasnt progressed at all on any device edit minutes inhttp and were looking like eus chances at getting outta groups edit hour in ive just gotten in on one device unsurprisingly its saying no tickets currently available edit while typing the comment above i was literally just about to say ill try refreshing the page and hit refresh and it showed ticket available for floor and the next tier but as soon as i clicked on it it wasnt available anymore

author: JarvanIVPrez
clean_body: http for background im a journalist in the space and i write almost exclusively about league i know this is really just a marketing ploy but honestly it took my breath away a little bit so i wanted to at least share it on here on the inside was a pamphlet with more info on the partnership a mouse pad and a worlds hat the box itself though is really the kicker this definitely made me more excited about worlds and proud to be a part of the games ecosystem and i think its well done edit more angles http
